roleset.name: convert to a yearly basis

role.descr: term, length of time annualized over

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on Newswire. No VNcls.

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: So when you hear people throwing around numbers, it's useful *pro* to annualize them -- to think of them in terms of what they'd mean for a normal, full-year budget.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: [Self-Employment income]-1 must be annualized *trace*-1 over a twelve month period even if received over a shorter period of time if it represents the household's annual income.
example.arg: even if received over a shorter period of time if it represents the household's annual income.
